text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sunshine
Brightness in my eyes
City awake and hustlin'
No time for goodbyes

[Verse 2]
Coffee brewing magic
Toast is in the air
Simple morning magic
No worries no care

[Chorus]
Morning glow morning light
Everything's feelin' right
Wake up the brand new day
Chase all the blues away

[Verse 3]
Birds are singing sweetly
Dancing on the breeze
Life feels light and breezy
Feel so wild and free

[Verse 4]
Neighbors out there smiling
Life is in the air
Hearts are bright and shining
Love is everywhere

[Chorus]
Morning glow morning light
Everything's feelin' right
Wake up the brand new day
Chase all the blues away
title: Morning Sunshine
